name: kreuzberg-dev/html-to-markdown
description: Modern PHP API for the html_to_markdown native extension powered by the Rust html-to-markdown engine.

suggest.ext-html_to_markdown: Provides native conversion. Install via PIE (goldziher/html-to-markdown) or download the release binary.

scripts.csfixer: PHP_CS_FIXER_IGNORE_ENV=1 php vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --config packages/php/php-cs-fixer.php packages/php/src packages/php/tests
scripts.format: PHP_CS_FIXER_IGNORE_ENV=1 php vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --config packages/php/php-cs-fixer.php packages/php/src packages/php/tests
scripts.format:check: PHP_CS_FIXER_IGNORE_ENV=1 php vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --config packages/php/php-cs-fixer.php --dry-run packages/php/src packages/php/tests
scripts.lint:fix: PHP_CS_FIXER_IGNORE_ENV=1 php vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --config packages/php/php-cs-fixer.php packages/php/src packages/php/tests && php -d detect_unicode=0 vendor/bin/phpstan --configuration=packages/php/phpstan.neon

configure-options.name: with-cargo-bin
configure-options.description: Path to the cargo executable used to build the extension.
